entries.description: Add Cilium 1.13.8 as supported CNI version, deprecate cilium version 1.13.0 as it's impacted by CVE-2023-34242.
Increase default CPU limits for KKP API/seed/master-controller-managers to prevent general slowness.
Fix node-labeller controller not applying the `x-kubernetes.io/distribution` label to RHEL nodes.
